text: The Vietnam Veterans Memorial, also called the Wall, honors the men and women who died in the Vietnam War. It is a black granite wall which has the names of every American killed in the war. It was designed by Maya Lin in 1981 and is in Washington, DC. ==Sources== Category:Buildings and structures in Washington, D.C. Category:Military monuments and memorials in the United States Category:Vietnam War Category:National Memorials of the United States
title: Vietnam Veterans Memorial
